item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Hollywood/Celebrity Niche - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced video editor with a passion for the Hollywood/celebrity niche. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and producing high-quality videos that showcase the glamour and excitement of the entertainment industry. Your main tasks will include selecting and editing footage, adding special effects and transitions, and ensuring the final product meets our clients' specifications. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of storytelling and be able to work independently to meet tight deadlines. Experience with video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro is required.

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Attention to detail
- Time management
- Knowledge of video editing software

Description
Video Duration 15-20 minutes
Pay-$15

Join our team and showcase your editing skills in the Hollywood/celebrity niche!

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 20, 2024 20:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: India
click to apply

item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative Content Creation Specialist to develop engaging and effective advertisements for TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of social media trends and the ability to create compelling content that resonates with high school students and their parents.

item.title: Story Driven Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
PLEASE SUBMIT YOUR RATE, PROPOSAL, AND ROUGH TIMELINE WITH YOUR PORTFOLIO.

We are an education equity nonprofit looking for a multi-cam editor who can compose interviews based on footage we've already shot. We have multiple angles and audio-- we just need a skilled editor with a great eye and sense of story to compose each segment. It's not hard work, but there is a lot of footage and it takes some time. If you have the skills, send us your portfolio, and rate based on hourly work or by segment/interview (assuming each interview is approx 5-15 min with fat trimmed out).



Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 20:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Documentary, Promotional Video, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Creative Cloud, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Movie

item.title: Video Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Video Content Creator to produce engaging videos on specific topics. As a Video Content Creator, you will be responsible for researching, scripting, shooting, and editing high-quality videos that align with our target audience's interests. The ideal candidate should have a strong eye for visual storytelling and possess excellent video editing skills. This role requires a creative mindset and the ability to turn ideas into compelling video content.

Responsibilities:
- Researching and identifying trending topics for video content
- Scripting videos to ensure clear and concise messaging
- Shooting high-quality videos using professional equipment
- Editing videos to enhance visual appeal and storytelling
- Collaborating with the team to brainstorm and develop video concepts

Requirements:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong storytelling and scriptwriting skills
- Excellent attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
- Knowledge of current trends in video content creation

If you are a creative individual with a passion for producing captivating videos, we would love to hear from you. Please provide examples of your previous work in video content creation.

Budget: $10,000
Posted On: June 20, 2024 19:58 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: English Speaking Youtube tutorial Screen record and Voiceover Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there,

I am Searching for Someone who can create & post "how to" Type Short Videos for a Youtube Automation Channel.

Videos Could be for example "how to change your username on Snapchat, or "how to delete account on Discord".

Videos can be screen recorded either on a pc or smartphone. There needs to be a Voiceover explaining what you're doing.

Example video: ( (How to delete your instagram account) )

Videos would be short-style videos with an educational purpose, aiming for a search-based channel.

We have a budget of 1$ per minute and the videos are usually arround 1 minute to maximum 7 minutes.
I'm looking for someone with whom I can work long-term and create a business relationship.

If possible make an example video on your pc or laptop like the one above.

Please make sure to let me know how many videos you could produce a month & if you have any experience in this field.

PLEASE READ **Please include an example screen recording video with your voice so we can see and hear your work in action. Without a example no reaction from our side.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 20, 2024 19:51 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Voice-Over, Screencasting Video
Skills: Voice-Over, Screencasting Video
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Seeking Social Media Content Creator for Video + Reel Production - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We seek a talented and creative social media content creator to produce several engaging and high-quality reels (20 to 30 seconds long) for our startup fitness company. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of various social media platforms, especially Instagram and YouTube, and be able to create visually appealing content that aligns with our brand.

Responsibilities:
- Conceptualize, script, and produce multiple reels that showcase our products and services in an exciting and attention-grabbing manner
- Collaborate to ensure the content aligns with our brand and marketing objectives
- Stay up to date with the latest social media trends and algorithm changes to optimize content for maximum reach and engagement
- Edit and enhance footage to create visually stunning and engaging reels
- Monitor and analyze the performance of the produced content to make data-driven decisions for future productions

Requirements:
- Proven experience creating engaging and successful content for social media platforms
- Strong proficiency in video editing software and graphic design tools
- Excellent understanding of social media algorithms and best practices
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously
- Strong communication and collaboration skills

We would love to hear from you if you are a creative individual passionate about social media content creation and have a knack for storytelling. Please provide examples of your previous work when applying for this exciting opportunity!


Posted On: June 20, 2024 19:47 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Content Creation, Content Creation, Content Planning, Social Media Account Setup, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Management, Canva, Social Media Design, Campaign Setup, Ad Campaign
Skills: Social Media Content Creation, Content Creation, Content Planning, Social Media Account Setup, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Management, Canva, Social Media Design, Campaign Setup, Ad Campaign
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube Talking Head Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We’re looking for a video editor who’s experienced to cut, and edit videos based on a given framework.



Requirements:



- Expertise in Adobe Premiere
- Passionate about YouTube and Instagram
- Native-level English proficiency
- Highly self-managed
- Extremely reliable



Responsibilities:
- Review provided raw materials to identify useful sequences
- Edit videos, including adding captions, effects, and creating horizontal thumbnail images
- Edit videos specifically for YouTube Shorts and Instagram Reels
- Send videos for feedback and incorporate necessary changes



This is a freelance position on a monthly retainer basis.



Please send your portfolio (horizontal Youtube videos + Instagram Reels/Shorts) weekly availability together with a short CV. Add the word “cherry” to your application

Budget: $100

Category: Video Editing

item.title: UFC Fight Clipping Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled individual to clip UFC fights into short form content. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of content creation and content editing. You must be able to identify and extract the most exciting moments from each fight. Attention to detail and the ability to work quickly and efficiently are crucial for this role. The selected candidate will be responsible for creating engaging and high-quality clips that highlight the intensity and skill of each fight.

Relevant skills:
- Proficient in video editing software
- Knowledge of UFC fights and rules
- Strong attention to detail
- Ability to work under tight deadlines

This is a small project that can be completed in under 1 month.

Expertise: Intermediate

item.title: Motion graphics clips for social media - Upwork
item.description:
I have a magazine that features people. I am looking for someone to help me create a very clean, minimalist but powerful and super elegant commercial of 15sec that will be played on social media, tv streaming and more. This will be an ongoing opportunity for the right person I would like to rely on this person to give assignments for all motion graphics and video projects. For every project we will need the source file, that is not negotiable.   

Think creating a very inspiring commercial similar to Nike and the commercial will be played on billboards in nyc.

I need someone that will read requirements, and not cut corners to deliver a fast project to make a quick buck or use templates of others affecting the originality of the brand.

Budget: $350
Posted On: June 20, 2024 19:12 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
